name: ziad-portfolio
description: Cloud & DevOps Portfolio with automated CI/CD pipeline

scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.build: if not exist build mkdir build && copy index.html build\ && xcopy css build\css\ /E /I && xcopy js build\js\ /E /I && xcopy images build\images\ /E /I && xcopy assets build\assets\ /E /I
scripts.serve: python -m http.server 8000 2>nul || python3 -m http.server 8000 2>nul || py -m http.server 8000 2>nul || echo Please install Python or open index.html directly in your browser
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run build

author: Ziad Ez-Zaidi <ziadezzaidi@gmail.com>
